faqs.question: Is there a free version of ChronoTask?
faqs.answer: Yes, ChronoTask offers a free plan with essential features for individuals and small projects. You can start using the basic features without any cost.

faqs.question: Can I integrate other tools with ChronoTask?
faqs.answer: Yes, ChronoTask integrates seamlessly with popular tools like Slack, Google Drive, and other productivity applications to enhance your workflow.

faqs.question: Is ChronoTask available on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, ChronoTask is available on both iOS and Android devices, allowing you to manage your tasks on the go with our mobile apps.

faqs.question: What is the difference between the Pro and Enterprise Plans?
faqs.answer: The Pro Plan is designed for teams and includes advanced collaboration and unlimited projects. The Enterprise Plan offers full customization, dedicated support, and enhanced security for larger organizations.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can easily upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.
